page.title: 13BADDESLEY COLLIERY
page.content:
BADDESLEY COLLIERY lies in the Northern area of the Warwickshire Coalfield. At it's widest extremity around the Atherstone area it extends to a width of 13 km. The Colliery's output is 600,000 tonnes per year, produced from four Production units all fully mechanised with powered supports and face end mechanisation, including the latest developments in automatic steering.
All coal from the mine is conveyed into the Coal Preparation Plant which can handle 240 tonnes per hour. About 68% of the Colliery output goes directly to the Central Electricity Generating Board.
